title: if statement
code:
if name == 'Jaipal': print('Hello Jaipal');
else: print('Hello World')

title: Private members of class
code:
class Person:
    def __init__(self, name, salary):
        self.name= name
        self.__salary= salary
Person1 = Person("Jaipal", 100000)
print(Person1.__salary)
# Throws error
